text: Caffeine Free Chai Mix all of the blend ingredients together. This makes the base tea blend. Store in an airtight container. If not using immediately, store properly to guarantee freshness. If giving as a gift, write out the ingredients on an attractive label and attach to the container.  Make chai. Infuse 1 1/2 teaspoons of the blend in 1/3 cup of hot water. Warm the cup(s) of milk per cup of chai.  Strain the tea into a cup. Pour in the warmed milk to top of cup. Stir gently and serve. If wished, leave a cinnamon stick in the cup for additional stirring as consumed. Raspberry Leaf Caffeine-Free Chai Latte Place the raspberry leaf teabags inside a heatproof vessel.  Pour the boiling water over the teabags.  Add the star anise, cinnamon sticks, cloves and fennel seeds.  Stir the ingredients together. Cover with a lid and a towel over the top to keep it hot. Let steep for 20 minutes. Preheat the serving pitcher. Fill it with hot tap water. When it is warmed, empty it and place a strainer over the top. Carefully pour the spiced mixture in. Stir in the powdered whole milk. Mix well. Sweeten to taste. Either add sugar of a sweetener of your choice. Serve.  Finished.
